short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To know when opsct goes live !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to know when OPsct goes live (Twitch.tv)!

When OPsct goes live, a popup appears. The extension icon's goes green when OPsct is live and red he is'nt. By clicking on the icon it will open directly the stream. 

Developped by Florian CHAPON - For every request contact me through my website form http://florian-chapon.fr/#contact or directly per email at chapon.florian@gmail.com.
